about_the_game:
A turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler where you maneuver to collect items enabling you to fight enemies. Pick your hero, craft your deck, unlock powerful artifacts and forge your path through dungeons filled with ruthless enemies, dangerous traps and cataclysmic events!

ROGUELIKE GAMEPLAY

Explore procedurally generated dungeons filled with intricate puzzles and challenges, ensuring that each descent is a unique experience. With procedurally generated content and a variety of character builds to experiment with, this game offers endless replay-ability for both new and seasoned adventurers.

EACH DECISION MATTERS

Each move shape your environment where you have to make your path. Each decisions impact all future possibilities, and each move hides a great tactical depth. Engage in strategic battles against a variety of enemies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Plan your moves carefully to emerge victorious.

UNLOCKABLE ARTIFACTS, HEROES AND DUNGEONS

Unlock heroes with different starting abilities and skills to create your custom run! Discover a wealth of items that can aid or hinder your progress, and craft your gear wisely with more than 50 artifacts offering a wide variety of effects that you can unlock with every game you play! Unlock the various dungeon realms and uncover how each one introduces new rules, increasing the game's difficulty. Will you be able to reach the final dungeon?

name: Temple Crawler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
